page.title: 12 THE MAIN ROAD
page.content: I live in Long Sutton and the A17 goes right through our town. The A17 starts at King's Lynn and ends at Newark-on-Trent, where the A1 starts, leading to the industrial areas of Yorkshire and the North East. Newark is also a stepping off point for the Midland's industry. In King's Lynn, roads branch off leading to Norfolk and Suffolk coasts. The A47 branches off from King's Lynn leading to ports like Felixstowe and Harwich. The summer holiday traffic at weekends is terrible. People are queueing up for ages. The road is narrow and twisty. Because the road was not built for large lorries and endless amounts of traffic there are constant roadworks and detours.
